name: Air Gold Coast
about: Air Gold Coast is a premier Flight Training academy in Australia, located at the Gold Coast International Airport, Coolangatta. We offer a world-class training facility, late-model training aircraft, and an innovative curriculum, making us the logical choice for career-oriented pilots. With the ability to provide training from single-engine aircraft to Citation Jet ratings, we cater to a wide range of aviation aspirations. Our location in the Gold Coast, known for its ideal coastal climate and favourable weather, ensures year-round flight training. Operating from a radar-controlled airport, students gain valuable experience among commercial airliners. Safety and security are paramount, and our friendly, professional staff and well-maintained facilities ensure a supportive and educational environment. We are a Registered Training Organisation with CRICOS approval, making us an excellent choice for both domestic and international students. Contact us to start your flying career today.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
